title: NYC journalist who documented pro - Palestinian vandalism arrested on felony hate crime charges
message:
NEW YORK (AP) — A New York City journalist was arrested on felony hate crime charges Tuesday after filming a pro-Palestinian protest earlier this summer in which activists hurled red paint at the homes of top leaders at the Brooklyn Museum.
She described the arrest and use of a hate crime statute as an “appalling” overreach by police against a journalist with a city-issued press credential.
“This is an extremely serious charge against a journalist,” said Robert Balin, an attorney who has defended photojournalists arrested by the NYPD.
The vandalism came days after hundreds of pro-Palestinian protesters occupied the Brooklyn Museum’s lobby and vandalized artwork.
Last week, police arrested another suspect, 28-year-old Taylor Pelton, who is accused of driving the car used by the vandals.

title: Pa . Gov . Josh Shapiro says work  far from finished  after VP snub as sources say Kamala Harris was afraid hed steal the  spotlight
message:
Josh Shapiro broke his silence about not joining the 2024 Democratic ticket as the vice presidential candidate — with sources attributing presidential nominee Kamala Harris’ snub to her fear that he would steal the “spotlight.”Shapiro said Harris and her “exceptionally strong” VP pick, Minnesota Gov.
REUTERS“They have a pro-Palestinian, in some cases pro-Hamas wing of the Democratic Party.
7 “I think if the flak he’d taken regarding Israel had been a stronger consideration, he wouldn’t have made it this far at all,” one Democratic operative said of Shapiro.
REUTERSBut the other Democratic operative who spoke with The Post dismissed the notion of anti-Israel sentiment playing a role.
7 Some GOP candidates and lawmakers expressed relief at Walz being the vice presidential pick.

title: Trump campaign tries to paint Harris VP pick Tim Walz as  radical liberal
message:
The Trump campaign is painting Vice President Kamala Harris’ as a running mate in the presidential election as evidence she caved to pressures from the party’s progressive wing by choosing him over Pennsylvania Gov.
"It’s no surprise that San Francisco Liberal Kamala Harris wants West Coast wannabe Tim Walz as her running-mate – Walz has spent his governorship trying to reshape Minnesota in the image of the Golden State,” Trump campaign press secretary Karoline Leavitt said in a statement.
“We're gonna wait until they actually nominate Kamala Harris and Tim Walz before we do any debates,” Vance said.
Trump agreed to those dates on behalf of his then-unidentified running mate but said it would be on Fox News, which the Democratic ticket never agreed to.
Vance has said he wants to debate Harris’ running mate prior and after the announcement of Walz’s selection but has not agreed to dates.
